sentences.sContent: I never liked long walks, especially in winter.
sentences.sCn: 我向来不喜欢长距离散步，尤其在冬天。

sentences.sContent: I was especially fond of chocolate biscuits.
sentences.sCn: 我特别爱吃巧克力饼干。

sentences.sContent: She bought a new pair of trainers especially for the trip.
sentences.sCn: 她特地为那次旅行买了一双新的运动鞋。

trans.tranCn: 尤其；特别，格外；专门地，主要地
trans.tranOther: used to emphasize that something is more important or happens more with one particular thing than with others
